lead_paragraph: GUTH--Polly. The Glimmerglass Festival family fondly remembers Polly Guth, whose warmth and generosity will forever linger among those who had the honor and pleasure of knowing her, and through the many programs and buildings she helped to bring to life through her gracious generosity. Not one to have things "named" for her, her gifts were always for "the cause" not the glory. But among her most treasured gifts were her compassion, joy for life and passion to help make extraordinary things happen. We will greatly miss this special lady and leader. 1/3
